item.title: Building command line scripts like a pro with Python
item.description: I find myself writing quick command line scripts every so often. They usually automate a random task from my daily routine and end up saving me a bunch of time. These scripts usually start as quick and dirty snippets, but once I figure that they are not a one-off thing, then I iterate to make them more usable. There are several things that I find valuable in scripts like these:
